alert.note: Alert for Western Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 9:46PM PST until November 30 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
